entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: Under orders from General Jan Dodonna, you destroyed an AT-ST that was being repaired and would surely have been used in an assault.
entries.journal_entry_description: General Jan Dodonna has ordered you to destroy an AT-ST that is being repaired at a nearby Imperial encampment.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Destroy an AT-ST that is being repaired by the Empire in anticipation of another assault on Rebel troopers. Reports place them somewhere close to the east on a beach.
entries.task00_start_message: As you plant the explosives on the AT-ST, you hear the sounds of some stormtroopers returning to the camp.
entries.task00_utterance_wave_1: Halt, what are you doing there?
